Class IRadar

        public boolean setBackgroundTexture(String texturePath)
        Set background texture of the radar from then given file path. Supported formats are PNG and JPG.
        Parameters:
        texturePath - Path to the texture image file. true on success

        Parameters:

      • setBackgroundTexture

        public boolean setBackgroundTexture(String textureName,
                                    ImageStruct image,
                                    boolean updateable)
        Set background texture of the radar from the given image structure.
        Parameters:
        textureName - A name that should be assigned to the texture (for reuse).
        image - The actual image.
        updateable - Flag to signal, that this image will be frequently updated. true on success

      • setObjectsDefaultTexture

        public boolean setObjectsDefaultTexture(String texturePath)
        Set default texture of the radar objects from then given file path. The new texture is applied to all radar objects in case of success.Supported formats are PNG and JPG.
        Parameters:
        texturePath - Path to the texture image file. true on success

      • setObjectTexture

        public boolean setObjectTexture(IGeometry geometry,
                                String texturePath)
        Set default texture of the radar objects from then given file path. The new texture is applied to all radar objects in case of success.Supported formats are PNG and JPG.
        Parameters:
        geometry - Geometry for which corresponding object's texture is set
        texturePath - Path to the texture image file. true on success

      • setObjectTexture

        public boolean setObjectTexture(IGeometry geometry,
                                File texturePath)
        Set default texture of the radar objects from then given file path. The new texture is applied to all radar objects in case of success.Supported formats are PNG and JPG.
        Parameters:
        geometry - Geometry for which corresponding object's texture is set
        texturePath - Path to the texture image file. true on success

      • setObjectTexture

        public boolean setObjectTexture(IGeometry geometry,
                                String textureName,
                                ImageStruct image,
                                boolean updateable)
        Set default texture of the radar objects from the given image structure. The new texture is applied to all radar objects in case of success.
        Parameters:
        geometry - Geometry for which corresponding object's texture is set
        textureName - A name that should be assigned to the texture (for reuse).
        image - The actual image.
        updateable - Flag to signal, that this image will be frequently updated. It should always be true on Android. true on success

      • setObjectTexture

        public boolean setObjectTexture(IGeometry geometry,
                                String textureName,
                                ImageStruct image)
        Set default texture of the radar objects from the given image structure. The new texture is applied to all radar objects in case of success.
        Parameters:
        geometry - Geometry for which corresponding object's texture is set
        textureName - A name that should be assigned to the texture (for reuse).
        image - The actual image.
        updateable - Flag to signal, that this image will be frequently updated. It should always be true on Android. true on success

      • getObjectScale

        public Vector3d getObjectScale(IGeometry geometry)
        Get scale of the radar object that represents given geometry.
        Parameters:
        geometry - Geometry for which the corresponding object scale is returned a vector containing relative scale of the object, if geometry is not found, the scale will be invalid, i.e. (-1,-1,-1). See: setObjectScale

      • setRelativeToScreen

        public void setRelativeToScreen(int anchor,
                                int flags)
        Set the radar relative to one of the anchor points on screen.
        Parameters:
        anchor - one of the screen anchor points
        flags - additional flags to ignore some geometric transforms, default is IGeometry::FLAG_MATCH_DISPLAY See: IGeometry::setRelativeToScreen

      • setRelativeToScreen

        public void setRelativeToScreen(int anchor)
        Set the radar relative to one of the anchor points on screen.
        Parameters:
        anchor - one of the screen anchor points
        flags - additional flags to ignore some geometric transforms, default is IGeometry::FLAG_MATCH_DISPLAY See: IGeometry::setRelativeToScreen

      • getRelativeToScreen

        public int getRelativeToScreen()
        Get relative-to-screen anchor. One or combination of screen anchors. See: setRelativeToScreen

      • setTranslation

        public void setTranslation(Vector3d translation,
                           boolean concat)
        Set the translation of the radar geometry.
        Parameters:
        translation - The 3D translation vector in millimeters.
        concat - If true, the new translation is added to the existing one, otherwise it is overwritten. See: getTranslation

      • setTranslation

        public void setTranslation(Vector3d translation)
        Set the translation of the radar geometry.
        Parameters:
        translation - The 3D translation vector in millimeters.
        concat - If true, the new translation is added to the existing one, otherwise it is overwritten. See: getTranslation

      • getTranslation

        public Vector3d getTranslation()
        Get the current translation of the radar geometry. A 3D vector containing the translation in millimeters. See: setTranslation

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Determine the visibility of the radar. True if the radar is set visible, false otherwise. See: setVisible

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Set the visibility of the radar.
        Parameters:
        visible - True if the radar should be visible, false if it should be hidden. See: isVisible

      • setTransparency

        public void setTransparency(float transparency)
        Set the transparency of the radar.
        Parameters:
        transparency - The transparency value, where 0 corresponds to a non-transparent radar, 1 to a fully transparent radar. See: getTransparency See: setVisible and getIsVisible

      • getTransparency

        public float getTransparency()
        Get the transparency of the radar. transparency The transparency value, where 0 corresponds to a non- transparent radar, 1 to a fully transparent radar. See: setTransparency

      • setPickingEnabled

        public void setPickingEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable picking for the radar geometry.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable picking of the radar, false to disable it. See: isPickingEnabled

      • isPickingEnabled

        public boolean isPickingEnabled()
        Determine if picking is enabled or disabled for the radar geometry. true, if enabled, false otherwise See: setPickingEnabled
